name: NONG
description: Extreme demons that use a song that aren't found on newgrounds.

name: 2P
description: Extreme demons that are meant for two players.

name: Circles
description: Extreme demons that using the nine circles theme.

name: Clicksync
description: Extreme demons that have gameplay sync to a song.

name: Fast-Paced
description: Extreme demons that move fast.

name: Timings
description: Extreme demons that mostly contain timings (cube, ball, ufo, robot, spider).

name: Chokepoints
description: Extreme demons that contain parts in the level that are hard to pass.

name: Learny
description: Extreme demons that take more time than usual to learn.

name: Memory
description: Extreme demons with gameplay that can't be coherently read.

name: High CPS
description: Extreme demons with a lot of clicks in a short time.

name: Gimmicky
description: Extreme demons with gameplay that doesn't reflect the norm.

name: Flow
description: Extreme demons that have the gameplay flow with the song being used.

name: Slow-Paced
description: Extreme demons that move slow.

name: Precision
description: Extreme demons with very precise clicks throughout the level.

name: Bossfight
description: Extreme demons that contain a bossfight within the level.

name: Mirror
description: Extreme demons that has mirrored gameplay through most of the level.

name: Nerve Control
description: Extreme demons that test how nervous a player gets towards the end of the level.

name: Cube
description: Extreme demons that contain mostly cube gameplay.

name: Ship
description: Extreme demons that contain mostly ship gameplay.

name: Ball
description: Extreme demons that contain mostly ball gameplay.

name: UFO
description: Extreme demons that contain mostly UFO gameplay.

name: Wave
description: Extreme demons that contain mostly wave gameplay.

name: Robot
description: Extreme demons that contain mostly robot gameplay.

name: Spider
description: Extreme demons that contain mostly spider gameplay.

name: Old Swing
description: Extreme demons that contain mostly old swing gameplay which involves a ball dual where one ball controls the other.

name: New Swing
description: Extreme demons that contain mostly swing gameplay.

name: Duals
description: Extreme demons that contain mostly dual gameplay.

name: Overall
description: Extreme demons that contain a mostly even amount of each gameplay mode.

name: Solo Intended
description: 2P Extreme demons intended to be played by one person.
